subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Pat White had the best passing game of his career, throwing for 332 yards on Saturday as West Virginia rallied to defeat North Carolina, 31-30, in the Meineke Bowl.
snippet: Pat White had the best passing game of his career, throwing for 332 yards on Saturday as West Virginia rallied to defeat North Carolina, 31-30, in the Meineke Bowl.
